Crop-circle in the front yard!

02 Nov 2005 After writing the previous entry, we went outside and trampled some of the grass on our front lawn. We now have a small crop-circle in front :) It was fun! maybe we can do more of this stuff sometime

I have pictures, but I'm not sure how to upload them into drupal, let alone link them to a blog entry...
